hook.text: After World War II, Toyota couldn't afford the waste that American car factories took for granted.

buildup.text: Engineer Taiichi Ohno developed a system: eliminate waste, empower workers, improve continuously.

discovery.text: Toyota's system produced cars faster, cheaper, and with fewer defects than Detroit's assembly lines.
